name: Workload Wizard Plugin
description: Dynamically generates metrics and data streams

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval (ms)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to poll the system for metrics.

paramSchema.title: Wizard Meter
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: It will default to the hostname of the server/meter.

paramSchema.title: Vertical Industries
paramSchema.name: verticals
paramSchema.description: Industries that you want to load metrics from the internal repository.(Use Comma-separated values eg: banking,telco,etc)

paramSchema.title: Personal Repository (URL)
paramSchema.name: personalRepository
paramSchema.description: URL of your personal repository containing metrics.

paramSchema.title: Pulse API (URL)
paramSchema.name: pulseAPI
paramSchema.description: Pulse API URL to where you want to create metrics and send measurements.
